title.native: ベイブレードバースト

description:
This is the story of a group of passionate Bladers who follow their dreams on an unforgettable journey to the top.

Valt Aoi is crazy about Beyblade. Valt's best friend since childhood, Shu Kurenai, is hailed as a Beyblade prodigy and has already been named as one of the National Beyblade Tournament's Final Four. Inspired by Shu's accomplishments, Valt sets his sights on reaching this year's national tournament. But to get to the big leagues, he must first emerge victorious from the district tournament – no easy feat, given the tough opponents standing in his way. Determined to win, Valt aims to make it to the championship, where he hopes to battle Shu and move on to the national tournament. As he battles, Valt broadens his circle of friends and reaches new heights. Without even realizing it, he has begun to dream of becoming the best Blader in the world.

(Source: Beyblade US site)

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/秋山勝仁)

Acknowledged for his work in the [Inazuma Eleven](https://anilist.co/anime/5231/) franchise and numerous [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/) shows in the '90s.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/renanlon) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RenanAlonsoDub) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/renanlon) | [Youtube 1](https://www.youtube.com/@Renan_Alonso) | [Youtube 2](https://www.youtube.com/@falafaladubdub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@renanlon)

Renan Alonso is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, musical director, musician, and podcaster. He is married to the voice actress [Bruna Nogueira](https://anilist.co/staff/176954/) and son of [Gilberto de Syllos](https://anilist.co/staff/258936/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Mortimer "Morty" Smith (Rick and Morty franchise and MultiVersus)
- Yoru (Valorant)
- Adrian "Alucard" Tepes (Castlevania and Castlevania: Nocturne)
- Percival de Rolo III (The Legend of Vox Machina)
- Cole Johnson (The Babysitter and The Babysitter: Killer Queen)
- H.U.E. (Final Space)
- Seo Hyun-Woo / Renan (Iris II: New Generation)
- Louis / Kang Ji-Sung (Shopping King Louie)
- Il-Sik (Mr. Sunshine)
- Eduard Zonte (Maggie & Bianca Fashion Friends)
- Happy (Happy!)
- Dirk Gently (Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency)
- Joel Maisel (The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel)
- Ace Spade (Heels)
- Bumblebee (Transformers: Cyberverse)
- Spike Barker (Go, Dog. Go!)
- Min-Gi Park, The Conductor, Cross-Eyed Ducks, Alrick Timmens, Roy and Brando / Zoobee (Infinity Train)
!~
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/152630/)._

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/moisesmora13/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MoisesIvanMora) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MoisesIvanMora)

Moisés Iván Mora González is a Mexican actor and voice actor. He is best known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Rigby in *Regular Show*, Blu in *Rio*, Scott Pilgrim in *Scott Pilgrim vs. the World* and Brad Buttowski in *Kick Buttowski: Suburban Daredevil*

He is the father of [Zoe Mora](https://anilist.co/staff/201443/Zoe-Mora).
Bruno Abundis Coronel is a voice actor from Mexico.

Affiliated with Mouse.

He is described by his colleagues as someone very efficient with his line work, particularly the speed at which he can make corrections.
